comments.en: 2 cartridges (color and black or color and photo)

With the simple driver "drv_z42" provided by Alwin Stolk one can at least print in up to 1200x600 dpi. There is also support in GIMP-Print 4.2 and especially on the CVS of GIMP-Print.

A salesman described the Z42 as identical to the Z52, only slower. However, the Z52 driver binary provided by Lexmark only printed garbage.
